resources.name: [format('{0}/{1}', parameters('name'), 'default')]
resources.properties: [if(parameters('enableStaticWebsite'), createObject('isVersioningEnabled', false(), 'cors', createObject('corsRules', createArray(createObject('allowedOrigins', createArray('*'), 'allowedMethods', createArray('GET', 'HEAD', 'OPTIONS'), 'allowedHeaders', createArray('*'), 'exposedHeaders', createArray('*'), 'maxAgeInSeconds', 3600)))), createObject())]

resources.name: [format('{0}/{1}', parameters('name'), 'default')]
resources.properties: [if(parameters('enableStaticWebsite'), createObject('isVersioningEnabled', false(), 'cors', createObject('corsRules', createArray(createObject('allowedOrigins', createArray('*'), 'allowedMethods', createArray('GET', 'HEAD', 'OPTIONS', 'POST', 'PUT'), 'allowedHeaders', createArray('*'), 'exposedHeaders', createArray('*'), 'maxAgeInSeconds', 3600)))), createObject())]

variables.analyzerBackendSettings: [if(not(equals(parameters('analyzerFunctionAppName'), '')), createArray(createObject('name', 'ANALYZER_FUNCTION_URL', 'value', format('https://{0}.azurewebsites.net', parameters('analyzerFunctionAppName'))), createObject('name', 'ANALYZER_FUNCTION_KEY', 'value', parameters('analyzerFunctionKey'))), createArray())]

siteConfig.appSettings: [concat(createArray(createObject('name', 'AzureWebJobsStorage', 'value', format('DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName={0};EndpointSuffix={1};AccountKey={2}', parameters('storageAccountName'), environment().suffixes.storage, listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts', parameters('storageAccountName')), '2023-01-01').keys[0].value)), createObject('name', 'DEPLOYMENT_STORAGE_CONNECTION_STRING', 'value', format('DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName={0};EndpointSuffix={1};AccountKey={2}', parameters('storageAccountName'), environment().suffixes.storage, listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts', parameters('storageAccountName')), '2023-01-01').keys[0].value)), createObject('name', 'FUNCTIONS_EXTENSION_VERSION', 'value', '~4'), createObject('name', 'APPINSIGHTS_INSTRUMENTATIONKEY', 'value', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Insights/components', parameters('appInsightsName')), '2020-02-02').InstrumentationKey), createObject('name', 'APPLICATIONINSIGHTS_CONNECTION_STRING', 'value', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Insights/components', parameters('appInsightsName')), '2020-02-02').ConnectionString)), variables('analyzerBackendSettings'))]

parameters.analyzerFunctionKey: [if(parameters('deploySilverGold'), createObject('value', listKeys(format('{0}/host/default', extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, variables('resourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.Web/sites', variables('analyzerFunctionAppName'))), '2023-12-01').functionKeys.default), createObject('value', ''))]

variables.analyzerBackendSettings: [if(not(equals(parameters('analyzerFunctionAppName'), '')), createArray(createObject('name', 'ANALYZER_FUNCTION_URL', 'value', format('https://{0}.azurewebsites.net', parameters('analyzerFunctionAppName'))), createObject('name', 'ANALYZER_FUNCTION_KEY', 'value', parameters('analyzerFunctionKey'))), createArray())]

siteConfig.appSettings: [concat(createArray(createObject('name', 'AzureWebJobsStorage', 'value', format('DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName={0};EndpointSuffix={1};AccountKey={2}', parameters('storageAccountName'), environment().suffixes.storage, listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts', parameters('storageAccountName')), '2023-01-01').keys[0].value)), createObject('name', 'DEPLOYMENT_STORAGE_CONNECTION_STRING', 'value', format('DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName={0};EndpointSuffix={1};AccountKey={2}', parameters('storageAccountName'), environment().suffixes.storage, listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts', parameters('storageAccountName')), '2023-01-01').keys[0].value)), createObject('name', 'FUNCTIONS_EXTENSION_VERSION', 'value', '~4'), createObject('name', 'APPINSIGHTS_INSTRUMENTATIONKEY', 'value', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Insights/components', parameters('appInsightsName')), '2020-02-02').InstrumentationKey), createObject('name', 'APPLICATIONINSIGHTS_CONNECTION_STRING', 'value', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Insights/components', parameters('appInsightsName')), '2020-02-02').ConnectionString)), variables('analyzerBackendSettings'))]
